body:
Comment 11: 
It's not a bug.  If you need a specific release of code, you need to make your own copy
of it.  This is often referred to as "vendoring."  Take a look at
https://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/PackageManagementTools .

In any case it sounds like this issue can be closed.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
